body: Theres not enough evidence of bigfoot either. What you just said is the epitome of what the term conspiracy theory means. If it was happening, there would be evidence. Literally every day this site upvotes like 5 new "smoking guns" to the top post and all of them magically get disproven and never mentioned by you again, or suddenly disappear when they go to court where there are consequences for lying. Trump appointed judges are tossing these lawsuits when they get them and his own lawyers have forced to admit in court theres no evidence of actual fraud. Thesecare all verifiable facts.

body: Hitchens razor: That which can be asserted without evidence cab be dismissed without evidence. Until theres sonething more solud, everyone should stfu. I'm not it can't be looked into,  but also no point in screaming about fraud nonstop as if its a sure thing when there has been none yet to have been shown to have happened, and no strong evidence pointing towards any other than a political party butthurt they lost an election.

body:
There's plenty of evidence. It's just not enough to get someone convicted, in which case it has to be *proof*. So no, it's not proven, but there's still pretty strong evidence of it.

I'll also mention that even if it is proven whoever's behind this is probably going to be able to persuade the justice system into letting them get away with it, like Hillary Clinton did with her emails. That's just always how it works with the swamp.
body_html:
There's plenty of evidence. It's just not enough to get someone convicted, in which case it has to be proof. So no, it's not proven, but there's still pretty strong evidence of it.

I'll also mention that even if it is proven whoever's behind this is probably going to be able to persuade the justice system into letting them get away with it, like Hillary Clinton did with her emails. That's just always how it works with the swamp.

body:
What a gross misunderstanding of whats happening. No wonder trymp supporters are so easy to manipulate. No one is on trial, the isnt going to be a conviction. These matters are based on a prepoderance of evidence, a much lower burden if proof. Lawyers just have to convince a judge there's more likely something going on than isnt. They cant even do that because all the evidence (which you didnt provide any of btw) is fabricated.

Trumps lawyers admitted in court therecwas no fraud, then dropped him as a client. Reoublican judges appointed directly by trump have been dismissing these cases. That's how little "evidence" there is.

Also the hillary email thing  not that it has anything to do with anything, and i dint support hillary on that matter  but trump and his admin have been using personal email since day one and magically republicans dont care and dint think its an offence anyone ahould go to prison for any longer.

Post real evidence or stop.
body_html:
What a gross misunderstanding of whats happening. No wonder trymp supporters are so easy to manipulate. No one is on trial, the isnt going to be a conviction. These matters are based on a prepoderance of evidence, a much lower burden if proof. Lawyers just have to convince a judge there's more likely something going on than isnt. They cant even do that because all the evidence (which you didnt provide any of btw) is fabricated.

Trumps lawyers admitted in court therecwas no fraud, then dropped him as a client. Reoublican judges appointed directly by trump have been dismissing these cases. That's how little "evidence" there is.

Also the hillary email thing not that it has anything to do with anything, and i dint support hillary on that matter but trump and his admin have been using personal email since day one and magically republicans dont care and dint think its an offence anyone ahould go to prison for any longer.

Post real evidence or stop.

parent.body:
There's plenty of evidence. It's just not enough to get someone convicted, in which case it has to be *proof*. So no, it's not proven, but there's still pretty strong evidence of it.

I'll also mention that even if it is proven whoever's behind this is probably going to be able to persuade the justice system into letting them get away with it, like Hillary Clinton did with her emails. That's just always how it works with the swamp.

post.body: Sums this whole election up perfectly imo. *Totally* nothing suspicious about all these mail-in votes /s
post.body_html: Sums this whole election up perfectly imo. Totally nothing suspicious about all these mail-in votes /s
post.title: Trump: "I had such a big lead in all of these states late into election night, only to see the leads miraculously disappear as the days went by. Perhaps these leads will return as our legal proceedings move forward!"
